SELECT pg.id AS id, pg.games_name AS gamesName, pg.games_info AS gamesInfo, pg.game_rule AS gameRule, pg.game_type AS gameType, pg.enroll_time AS enrollTime, pg.start_time AS startTime, pg.end_time AS endTime, pg.is_delete AS isDelete, pg.sports_id AS sportsId, pg.field_id AS fieldId, pg.stage AS stage, pst.sports_name AS sportsName, sd.depart_name AS businessName, pfi.field_name AS fieldName from playball_games pg, playball_sports_type pst, playball_field_info pfi, sys_depart sd where pg.sports_id = pst.id and pg.field_id = pfi.id and pfi.business_id = sd.id and pg.id=#{id}
